value:
$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|This Tempest is troubling... Worlds
are twined into its winds. They mix,
they scatter... It is ultimate chaos.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|If the worlds are infinite, as I was
told... Any world that I could wish for
exists here.$k$pDid things become this way because
of me? Is it because I hoped for
things to be different?$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Azura, no. You don't have that
kind of power.$k$pThat woman made use of the
remnants of the power that remain
within you, that of your forebears.$k$pShall we go?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|Go? Go where?$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|We must stop the Tempest.$k$pHere, I have no special power. But
you are different. Lend me that
power, and we can fight together.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|I...I can't... I can't fight.$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|So you will do nothing? You will
stand by?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|I...$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|In the future...someone I know will
face a terrible choice, one much more
difficult than you face now.$k$pEither way they turn, people will die—
people they care about.$k$pTo stand at a crossroads like that
must feel like your body is being torn
apart...$k$pIn the future, the choice has been
made. They chose their path, and
they accepted responsibility for it.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|I... I can't. I can't be that strong.$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|If that is your decision, then...I will go.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|But...$k$p

$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|Thank you, Azura. You saved me.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|I...I just wanted you to finish the
story.$k$pThat person you were talking about...
What happened to them?$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|They continued on the path they
chose...all the way to the end,
without stopping.$k$pThey changed the future, Azura. They
changed the world.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|The...the world? It's impossible! I...I
can't...$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|That may be so. But bear this in
mind, Azura...$k$pEven if you can't change the world,
you can change yourself.$k$pIn fact, you have. Just now.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|The Tempest is weakening... It is time
for us to part, Azura.$k$pI do not think that we will meet again.
I will pray for your safety.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Dreaming18,Face|I...I won't give up. I may not have
the strength of the person you
spoke of, but...$k$pYour strength... You're me, aren't
you? So I can be strong like that.$k$p$WmMPID_アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_Normal,Face|Yes, Azura. That's right. You can.$k$p
